00044 Desc *cmdline_descp = NULL;

00048 
00049 int line_length() {
00050   int n = System::term_info().num_cols;
00051   return n > 0 ? n : 80;
00052 }
00053 
00054 String usage_str(const char *usage) {
00055   if (!usage)
00056     usage = "Usage: %s [options]\n\nOptions";
00057 
00058   if (strstr(usage, "%s"))
00059     return format(usage, System::exe_name.c_str());
00060 
00061   return usage;
00062 }
00063 
00064 Desc &cmdline_desc(const char *usage) {
00065   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00066 
00067   if (!cmdline_descp)
00068     cmdline_descp = new Desc(usage_str(usage), line_length());
00069 
00070   return *cmdline_descp;
00071 }
00072 
00073 Desc &cmdline_hidden_desc() {
00074   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00075 
00076   if (!cmdline_hidden_descp)
00077     cmdline_hidden_descp = new Desc();
00078 
00079   return *cmdline_hidden_descp;
00080 }
00081 
00082 PositionalDesc &cmdline_positional_desc() {
00083   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00084 
00085   if (!cmdline_positional_descp)
00086     cmdline_positional_descp = new PositionalDesc();
00087 
00088   return *cmdline_positional_descp;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void cmdline_desc(const Desc &desc) {
00092   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00093 
00094   if (cmdline_descp)
00095     delete cmdline_descp;
00096 
00097   cmdline_descp = new Desc(desc);
00098 }
00099 
00100 Desc &file_desc(const char *usage) {
00101   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00102 
00103   if (!file_descp)
00104     file_descp = new Desc(usage ? usage : "Config Properties", line_length());
00105 
00106   return *file_descp;
00107 }
00108 
00109 void file_desc(const Desc &desc) {
00110   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00111 
00112   if (file_descp)
00113     delete file_descp;
00114 
00115   file_descp = new Desc(desc);
00116 }

00119   Path config(System::install_dir);
00120   config /= "conf/hypertable.cfg";
00121

00124     ("help-file", "Show help message for config file")

00274 
00275 void parse_args(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00276   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00277 
00278   HT_TRY("parsing init arguments",
00279     properties->parse_args(argc, argv, cmdline_desc(), cmdline_hidden_descp,
00280                            cmdline_positional_descp));
00281   // some built-in behavior
00282   if (has("help")) {
00283     std::cout << cmdline_desc() << std::flush;
00284     std::exit(0);
00285   }
00286 
00287   if (has("help-file")) {
00288     std::cout << file_desc() << std::flush;
00289     std::exit(0);
00290   }
00291 
00292   if (has("version")) {
00293     std::cout << version() << std::endl;
00294     std::exit(0);
00295   }
00296 
00297   Path defaultcfg(System::install_dir);
00298   defaultcfg /= "conf/hypertable.cfg";
00299   filename = get("config", defaultcfg.string());
00300 
00301   // Only try to parse config file if it exists or not default
00302   if (FileUtils::exists(filename)) {
00303     parse_file(filename, file_desc(), properties);
00304     file_loaded = true;
00305   }
00306   else if (filename != defaultcfg)
00307     HT_THROW(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, filename);
00308 
00309   sync_aliases();       // call before use
00310 }
00311 
00312 void
00313 parse_file(const String &fname, const Desc &desc, bool allow_unregistered) {
00314   properties->load(fname, desc, allow_unregistered);
00315 }
00316 
00317 void alias(const String &cmdline_opt, const String &file_opt, bool overwrite) {
00318   properties->alias(cmdline_opt, file_opt, overwrite);
00319 }
00320 
00321 void sync_aliases() {
00322   properties->sync_aliases();
00323 }
00324 
00325 void init_default_actions() {
00326   String loglevel = get_str("logging-level");
00327   bool verbose = get_bool("verbose");
00328 
00329   if (verbose && get_bool("quiet")) {
00330     verbose = false;
00331     properties->set("verbose", false);
00332   }
00333   if (get_bool("debug")) {
00334     loglevel = "debug";
00335     properties->set("logging-level", loglevel);
00336   }
00337 
00338   if (loglevel == "info")
00339     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::INFO);
00340   else if (loglevel == "debug")
00341     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::DEBUG);
00342   else if (loglevel == "notice")
00343     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::NOTICE);
00344   else if (loglevel == "warn")
00345     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::WARN);
00346   else if (loglevel == "error")
00347     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::ERROR);
00348   else if (loglevel == "crit")
00349     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::CRIT);
00350   else if (loglevel == "alert")
00351     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::ALERT);
00352   else if (loglevel == "fatal")
00353     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::FATAL);
00354   else {
00355     HT_ERROR_OUT << "unknown logging level: "<< loglevel << HT_END;
00356     std::exit(1);
00357   }
00358   if (verbose) {
00359     HT_NOTICE_OUT <<"Initializing "<< System::exe_name <<" ("<< version()
00360                   <<")..." << HT_END;
00361   }
00362 }
